boolShell

Class Recursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • boolShell.Recursion

  • public class Recursion
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all recursive methods Used by Commands Can substitute a Variable in a Formular by another Formular, simplify a Formular by using boolean rules, create a copy of a Formular
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Formular copyForm(Formular form)
      Creates a new structurly equal copy of a Formular
      static boolean equalForms(Formular form1, Formular form2)
      Compares two Formular with each other and returnes if they are equal
      static Formular simplify(Formular form, boolean left)
      Simplifies a given Formular using boolean rules
      static Formular subst(Formular form1, Variable check, Formular form2, boolean left)
      Substitutes the Variable check in a Formular form1 by another Formular form2 by searching it recursive in a tree-strucutr

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • subst

        public static Formular subst(Formular form1,
             Variable check,
             Formular form2,
             boolean left)
        Substitutes the Variable check in a Formular form1 by another Formular form2 by searching it recursive in a tree-strucutr
        Parameters:
        form1 - Formular in which substitution will happen
        check - Variable to substitute
        form2 - Formular which will override the check-Variable
        left - Current location in the tree-structur, true for child[0] and false for child[1]
        Returns:
        The substituted Formular

      • simplify

        public static Formular simplify(Formular form,
                boolean left)
        Simplifies a given Formular using boolean rules
        Parameters:
        form - Formular which should be simplified
        left - Current location in the tree-structur, true for child[0] and false for child[1]
        Returns:
        Simplified Formular

      • copyForm

        public static Formular copyForm(Formular form)
        Creates a new structurly equal copy of a Formular
        Parameters:
        form - Formular which should be copied
        Returns:
        Copy of the Formular

      • equalForms

        public static boolean equalForms(Formular form1,
                 Formular form2)
        Compares two Formular with each other and returnes if they are equal
        Parameters:
        form1 - First Formular to compare with
        form2 - Second Formular to compare with
        Returns:
        true for equal, false for not equal
